name: namely
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: used when you want to give more detail or be more exact about something you have just said

example.eg: We need to get more teachers into the classrooms where they're most needed, namely in high poverty areas.
example.egtrans: 我们要让更多的教师到最需要他们的课堂中去，也就是极度贫困地区的课堂。

example.eg: I learned an important lesson when I lost my job, namely that nothing is a hundred percent guaranteed.
example.egtrans: 我丢掉工作时得到了一个重要的教训，即没有任何事情是百分之百有保障的。
